    MovieController.getMovieByMovieId(int movieId)

    MovieController.getShowingMovieByMovieId(int movieId)

    Methods in controller that return types with arguments of type Movie
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.getAllMovies()
    READ all the Movies in the Database file Store into an array list of Movies return empty array list if no Movie exist
    static ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.getAllShowingMovie()
    READ all the Movie in the Database file, if movie is End of Showing, don't add to array list return empty array list if no Movie exist
    static ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.getMoviesByMovieTitle(String movieTitle)
    READ all the Movie in the array list of getAllShowingMovie() Store all results that contains or matches the movieTitle in an array list of movie return empty array list if no such Movie exists
    static ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.getMovieSortedByReviewRating()
    READ all the Movie in the array list of getAllShowingMovie() Store all results in array list of Movie if Review is not Empty return empty array list if all Movie review is empty Sorts the ArrayList in descending order of Movie Overall Rating
    static ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.getMovieSortedByTicketSales()
    READ all the Movie in the array list of getAllShowingMovie() Store all results in array list of Movie if ticketSale is not Empty return empty array list if all Movie's ticketSale is empty Sorts the ArrayList in descending order of Movie Ticket's sale
